title: Got this message today
selftext:
Anyone gets texts like these? I don't remember signing up for any loan application at Kreditbee, and I took chance with the link — it just took me to their app page on Play Store.

I'm asking this since with all these NBFC scams and fake loans in your name scams going on, one can't be careful enough. Let me know if this is something about which I should be pursuing legal action (however ineffective it might be in India) or just a really troublesome notification copy?
comments: It’s an ad. Just don’t click on anything
